episode_japan_title: Ore wa Luffy! Kaizoku Ou ni Naru Otoko Da!
episode_english_title: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Eric Vale
synopsis: Alvida pirates plunder a ship only to find a barrel containing a strange boy names Luffy who is on a quest to find the legendary "One Piece" and become the King of Pirates.

episode_japan_title: Daikengo Arawaru! Kaizokugari Roronoa Zoro
episode_english_title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Michiru Shimada, Eric Vale
synopsis: Luffy and Koby arrive at Shell Island where they meet Roronoa Zoro, a bounty hunter held under arrest by Captain Morgan.

episode_japan_title: Morgan vs. Luffy! Nazo no Bishoujo wa Dare?
episode_english_title: Morgan vs. Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Michiru Shimada, Eric Vale
synopsis: Luffy convinces Zoro to join his crew, but they must defeat Captain Morgan first. Meanwhile, Koby is accepted as a marine.

episode_japan_title: Luffy no Kako! Akagami no Shanks Toujou
episode_english_title: Luffy's Past! Enter Red-Haired Shanks!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: Luffy reflects on his past and how he came in possession of his Straw Hat.

episode_japan_title: Kyoufu Nazo no Chikara! Kaizoku Douke Buggy-senchou!
episode_english_title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: Nami tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to Buggy as a battle ensues.

episode_japan_title: Zettai Zetsumei! Mojutsukai Moji VS Rufi!
episode_english_title: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: After Buggy's defeat Mohji and Richie seek revenge while Luffy meets a small dog guarding his master's store.

episode_japan_title: Sozetsu Ketto! Kengo Zoro VS Kyokugei no Kabaji!
episode_english_title: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: The city's mayor rushes to fight Buggy but the Straw Hat Pirates come to his aid. Zoro fights Cajabi while Luffy faces Buggy himself.

episode_japan_title: Shousha wa docchi? Akuma no mi no nouryoku taiketsu!
episode_english_title: Who Is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: Luffy becomes enrages when Buggy rips his straw hat as the battle continues.

episode_japan_title: Seigi no usotsuki? Kyaputen Usoppu
episode_english_title: The Honorable Liar? Captain Usopp!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: Nami forms an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates as their navigator as the crew arrives at Syrup Village where they meet Usopp.

episode_japan_title: Chijou saikyou no hen na yatsu! Saiminjutsushi Jango
episode_english_title: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: Luffy and Usopp learn that Kaya's caretaker, Klahadore pairs up with a strange man plot as they plot to kill her.

episode_japan_title: Inbou o abake! Kaizoku shitsuji Kyaputen Kuro
episode_english_title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: After learning of Captain Kuro's evil plan, Usopp runs back to the village to warn Kaya, only to find that after all his years of lying no one believes him.

episode_japan_title: Gekitotsu! Kuroneko kaizokudan sakamichi no daikoubou!
episode_english_title: Clash With the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: Usopp, Luffy, Zoro, and Nami formulate a plan on the slope for when the pirates come.

episode_japan_title: Kyoufu no futarigumi! Nyâban kyoudai vs Zoro
episode_english_title: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Eric Vale, Junki Takegami
synopsis: The Straw Hat Pirates take out most of the Black Cat Pirates, so Jango orders the Nyaban Brothers to attack. Meanwhile, after getting hypnotized by Jango, Luffy gets himself stuck under the ... Read all

episode_japan_title: Rufi fukkatsu! Kaya ojousama no kesshi no taikou
episode_english_title: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!
synopsis: Captain Kuro arrives at the scene, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy being incapacitated, and the other two being too weak to handle him, things seem hopeless. However, Kaya herself ... Read all

episode_japan_title: Kuro o taose! Otoko Usoppu namida no ketsui!
episode_english_title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!
synopsis: Zoro and Buchi face off once again as Luffy and Kuro begin their fight.

episode_japan_title: Kaya o mamore! Usoppu kaizokudan daikatsuyaku!
episode_english_title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!
synopsis: As the fight between Luffy and Kuro is close to an end, the Usopp Pirates do their best to avoid Jango.

episode_japan_title: Ikari bakuhatsu! Kuro vs Rufi kecchaku no yukue!
episode_english_title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How It Ends!
synopsis: Kuro's ultimate attack destroys everything in the area and Luffy becomes enraged by his lack of regard for his crew.

episode_japan_title: Anta ga chunjuu! Gaimon to kimyou na nakama
episode_english_title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!
synopsis: With Usopp now in the crew and a new ship, the Going Merry, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure, only to encounter a strange man stuck in a treasure box.

episode_japan_title: Santouryuu no kako! Zoro to Kuina no chikai!
episode_english_title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!
synopsis: While Usopp and Luffy fool around with the ship's cannon one day, Zoro dreams about his childhood and the promise he made to Kuina.

episode_japan_title: Meibutsu kokku! Kaijou resutoran no Sanji
episode_english_title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!
synopsis: The crew meets Johnny and Yosaku, Zoro's former companions, and they set sail for the Baratie restaurant in search of a cook.

episode_japan_title: Manukarezaru kyaku! Sanji no meshi to Gin on
episode_english_title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!
synopsis: Luffy tries to recruit Sanji to join his crew.

episode_japan_title: Saikyou no kaizoku kantai! Teitoku Don Kurîku
episode_english_title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!
synopsis: Gin returns to the Baratie with his also-starving captain, Don Krieg, to whom Sanji once more gives food, but Don Krieg betrays the cook once he regains his energy.

episode_japan_title: Mamore Baratie! Daikaizoku akaashi no Zefu
episode_english_title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!
synopsis: It is revealed that Chef Zeff was a great pirate known as Red Leg Zeff. Gin explains the catastrophe the fleet met in Grand Line when they encountered Hawk-Eyes Mihawk, and Krieg attempts to... Read all

episode_japan_title: Taka no me no Mihôku! Kenzoku Zoro umi ni chiru
episode_english_title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls at Sea!
synopsis: As Nami steals the Going Merry, Mihawk has returned to finish the job, but Zoro challenges him to a duel in order to achieve his dream.

episode_japan_title: Hissatsu ashiwaza sakuretsu! Sanji vs Teppeki no Pâru
episode_english_title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. the Invincible Pearl!
synopsis: Mihawk leaves after defeating Zoro, so Krieg continues his invasion as Sanji reveals his fighting skills. Meanwhile, Johnny and Yosaku leave with Usopp and the wounded Zoro to go after Nami.

episode_japan_title: Zefu to Sanji no yume Maboroshi no ôru burû
episode_english_title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!
synopsis: With Zeff held captive by Gin, Sanji has no choice but to take Pearl's hits, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him.

episode_japan_title: Reitetsu hijou no kijin Kaizoku kantai soutaichou Gin
episode_english_title: Cool-Headed, Cold-Hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!
synopsis: Gin finishes off Pearl, claiming that he wants to kill Sanji himself. Still wounded, Sanji faces Gin while Luffy attacks Don Krieg.

episode_japan_title: Shinaneeyo! Gekitou Rufi vs Kurîku!
episode_english_title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!
synopsis: When Gin refuses to kill Sanji, Krieg uses poison gas on him. Luffy seems to have the advantage in the fight until Krieg pulls out his explosive Battle Spear.

episode_japan_title: Shitou no Ketchaku! Hara ni Kukutta Ippon no Yari!
episode_english_title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!
synopsis: Even after taking several hits from the Battle Spear, Luffy refuses to give up.

episode_japan_title: Tabidachi! Umi no kokku wa Rufi to tomoni
episode_english_title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets off With Luffy!
synopsis: Sanji makes the difficult decision on whether to stay or to go with Luffy.

episode_japan_title: Higashi no Umi Saiaku no Otoko! Gyojin Kaizoku Arlong!
episode_english_title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fish-Man Pirate Arlong!
synopsis: The crew chases after Nami, who stole their ship, and Yosaku takes time during the trip to explain about Arlong and his Fishmen to Luffy and Sanji. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro arrive ... Read all

episode_japan_title: Cocoyashi Mura no Majo! Arlong no Onna Kanbu
episode_english_title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!
synopsis: Zoro is captured by the fishmen. Usopp comes to the rescue when a group of Fishmen attack Cocoyashi Village.

episode_japan_title: Usopp Shisu?! Luffy Jouriku wa Mada?
episode_english_title: Usopp Dead?! When Is Luffy Going To Make Landfall?!
synopsis: After Zoro escapes with Nami's help, she tries to prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates by appearing to kill Usopp. Meanwhile, Luffy's group finally arrives at the island.

episode_japan_title: Zen'in Shuuketsu! Usopp ga Kataru Nami no Shinjitsu
episode_english_title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!
synopsis: Johnny tells the others about Nami killing Usopp. Luffy stubbornly decides to stay on the island.

episode_japan_title: Himerareta Kako! Onna Senshi Bell-mere!
episode_english_title: Untold Past! Female Warrior Bellemere!
synopsis: Nojiko starts her story about Nami's childhood and their adopted mother, Bellemere. Despite being poor and none of them being related by blood, they had a happy life.

episode_japan_title: Ikinuke! Haha Bellemere to Nami no Kizuna!
episode_english_title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!
synopsis: Nojiko continues her story, explaining how their life was ruined when the Arlong Pirates first took over the village.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Tatsu! Uragirareta Yakusoku no Ketsumatsu!
episode_english_title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!
synopsis: When marine officers under Arlong confiscate Nami's money, the villagers start a rebelion. Desperate, Nami asks Luffy for help.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Dai Pinch! Gyojin Tai Luffy Kaizokudan
episode_english_title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fish-Men vs. the Luffy Pirates!
synopsis: The Straw Hats face the Fishmen themselves as the villagers watch from the sidelines.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Suibotsu! Zoro vs Tako no Hacchan
episode_english_title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!
synopsis: Arlong has trapped Luffy in the ocean and Zoro faces the six-sword wielding octopus Hatchan.

episode_japan_title: Hokoritakaki Senshi! Gekitou Sanji to Usopp
episode_english_title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!
synopsis: With Hatchan defeated, two of the fishmen battle Sanji and Usopp.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Zenkai! Nami no Ketsui to Mugiwara Boushi
episode_english_title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!
synopsis: With Arlong's officers defeated Zoro and Sanji take on Arlong but prove that they aren't a match for him. However, with Luffy finally free, he takes on Arlong himself.

episode_japan_title: Sakuretsu! Gyojin Arlong Umi kara no Moukougeki!
episode_english_title: Explosion! Fish-Man Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!
synopsis: Luffy returns to the fight, and the battle with Arlong versus Luffy begins.

episode_japan_title: Gyojin Teikoku no Owari! Nami wa Ore no Nakama Da!
episode_english_title: End of the Fish-Man Empire! Nami's My Friend!
synopsis: The battle spreads into Arlong Park itself and Arlong is no longer holding back.

episode_japan_title: Egao no Tabidachi! Saraba Furusato Cocoyashi Mura
episode_english_title: Setting Out With a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!
synopsis: Arlong's reign of terror is over, and no one has anything on their mind except to party. As the crew celebrates, Nami reflects on her hometown and decides to officially join the Straw Hat Pi... Read all

episode_japan_title: Joukinkubi! Mugiwara no Luffy Yo ni Shirewataru
episode_english_title: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!
synopsis: With Buggy, Krieg and Arlong defeated, Luffy now has the highest bounty in East Blue.

episode_japan_title: Mugiwara o Oe! Chiisana Buggy no Daibouken
episode_english_title: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!
synopsis: After his fight with Luffy, Buggy was sent flying to another island with several body parts missing. Thus, Buggy begins his journey to find his crew and his body parts, making some unlikely ... Read all

episode_japan_title: Omachikane! Aa Fukkatsu no Buggy Senchou!
episode_english_title: The Wait Is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!
synopsis: With Buggy assumed to be dead, his crew fights over who will be the new captain.

episode_japan_title: Hajimari to Owari no Machi: Loguetown Jouriku
episode_english_title: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Loguetown!
synopsis: The crew arrives at the last large town before the entrance to the Grand Line: Loguetown, the place where Gold Roger was both born and executed.

episode_japan_title: Sandai Kitetsu to Yubashiri! Zoro no Shintou to Onna Souchou
episode_english_title: Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro's New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!
synopsis: While searching for a pair of new swords to replace the ones shattered by Mihawk, Zoro meets a woman named Tashigi. At first sight, she looks exactly like Kuina.

episode_japan_title: Usopp Tai Kozure no Daddy: Mahiru no Kettou
episode_english_title: Usopp vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!
synopsis: Usopp manages to anger the daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father, and finds his own life at stake when he challenges Daddy to a duel.

episode_japan_title: Honoo no Ryouri Battle? Sanji VS Bijin Chef
episode_english_title: Fiery Cooking Battle? Sanji vs. the Beautiful Chef!
synopsis: Sanji enters a cooking contest against a woman named Five-Alarm Carmen for a fish that he has always dreamed of cooking.

episode_japan_title: Buggy no Revenge! Shokeidai de Warau Otoko!
episode_english_title: Buggy’s Revenge! The Man Who Smiles on the Execution Platform!
synopsis: Zoro and Sanji show up too late to stop Buggy.

episode_japan_title: Densetsu wa Hajimatta! Mezase Grand Line
episode_english_title: The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!
synopsis: Miraculously saved from death by an unnatural green gust and a lightning bolt to Buggy, the Straw Hats rush out of Loguetown.

episode_japan_title: Aratanaru Bouken no Yokan! Nazo no Shoujo Apis
episode_english_title: Precursor to a New Adventure! Apis, a Mysterious Girl!
synopsis: On a stormy night, a girl called Apis escapes from the Marines and is found drifting by the Straw hats.

episode_japan_title: Kiseki no Seibutsu! Apis no Himitsu to Densetsu no Shima
episode_english_title: Miraculous Creature! Apis' Secret and the Legendary Island!
synopsis: The Calm Belt is revealed to have no winds or currents as well as being the home of many giant sea kings.

episode_japan_title: Eric Shutsugeki! Gunkanjima kara no Daidasshutsu!
episode_english_title: Eric Attacks! Great Escape From Warship Island!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Sean Whitley
synopsis: Now that the crew understand why Apis was followed, they hurry to escape the island so Ryuuji can be saved.

episode_japan_title: Zekkai no Kotou! Densetsu no Lost Island
episode_english_title: A Solitary Island in the Distant Sea! The Legendary Lost Island!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Sean Whitley
synopsis: After arriving at what seemed to be Lost Island, the Straw Hats find an old Temple with paintings that might indicate where the Lost Island really is.

episode_japan_title: Haikyo no Kettou! Kinpaku no Zoro VS Erik!
episode_english_title: Showdown in the Ruins! Tense Zoro vs. Eric!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Sean Whitley
synopsis: Zoro tries to fight Erik, but Erik is more interested in chasing the dragon.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Kanzen Houi! Teitoku Nelson no Hisaku
episode_english_title: Luffy, Completely Surrounded! Commodore Nelson's Secret Strategy!
synopsis: Admiral Nelson has mobilized the full extent of the 8th fleet.

episode_japan_title: Oozora o Mau Mono! Yomigaeru Sennen no Densetsu!
episode_english_title: Through the Sky They Soar! The 1000 Year Legend Lives Again!
synopsis: Luffy talks to Ryuuji in his final moments and comes to understand just what is going on. The flock of dragons returns just as Lost Island begins to re-surface.

episode_japan_title: Ikari no Kecchaku! Red Line o Norikoero!
episode_english_title: An Angry Showdown! Cross the Red Line!
synopsis: The Straw Hats depart for the Grand Line.

episode_japan_title: Saisho no Toride? Kyodai Kujira Laboon Arawaru
episode_english_title: The First Line of Defense? The Giant Whale Laboon Appears!
synopsis: As the Straw Hats ride down Reverse Mountain into the Grand Line, a huge whale appears in front of them.

episode_japan_title: Otoko no Yakusoku! Luffy to Kujira Saikai no Chikai
episode_english_title: A Promise Between Men! Luffy and the Whale Vow to Meet Again!
synopsis: While guiding them out of the giant whale, Laboon, its caretaker, Crocus, tells the whale's story to the Straw Hats.

episode_japan_title: Kaizoku Kangei no Machi? Whiskey Peak Jouriku
episode_english_title: A Town That Welcomes Pirates? Setting Foot on Whisky Peak!
synopsis: The weather changes rapidly on the first leg of their journey from Reverse Mountain to Whiskey Peak.

episode_japan_title: Sakuretsu Santouryuu! Zoro VS Baroque Works!
episode_english_title: Explosion! The Three Swords Style! Zoro vs. Baroque Works!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Zoro lets loose on the bounty hunters.

episode_japan_title: Shinken Shoubu! Luffy VS Zoro Nazo no Daikettou!
episode_english_title: All Out Battle! Luffy vs. Zoro, Mysterious Grand Duel!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine follow after Vivi; Luffy wants to fight Zoro.

episode_japan_title: Oujo Vivi o Todokero! Luffy Kaizoku Dan Shukkou
episode_english_title: Deliver Princess Vivi! The Luffy Pirates Set Sail!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Luffy agrees to take Vivi with them.

episode_japan_title: Ganbare Coby! Coby-Meppo Kaigun Funtou Ki
episode_english_title: Try Hard, Coby! Coby and Helmeppo’s Struggles in the Marines!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Coby and Helmeppo have enlisted into the navy as odd-jobbers.

episode_japan_title: Coby-Meppo no Ketsui! Garp Chuujou no Oyagokoro
episode_english_title: Coby and Helmeppo's Resolve! Vice-Admiral Garp’s Parental Affection
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Coby and Helmeppo are mentored by Vice Admiral Garp in becoming marines.

episode_japan_title: Taiko no Shima! Little Garden ni Hisomu Kage!
episode_english_title: An Ancient Island! The Shadow Hiding in Little Garden!
synopsis: As the Straw Hats sail toward Little Garden, the Baroque Works officer agents Mr. 3 and his partner Miss Golden Week receive new orders.

episode_japan_title: Dekkai Kettou! Kyojin Dorry to Brogy
episode_english_title: Huge Duel! The Giants Dorry and Broggy!
synopsis: Nami and Usopp are taken into Brogy's camp, meanwhile, Vivi and Luffy meet another giant, Dorry. They reveal that they will fight against each other whenever the volcano on the island erupts... Read all

episode_japan_title: Luffy Ikaru! Seinaru Kettou ni Hiretsu na Wana!
episode_english_title: Luffy Gets Angry! A Dirty Trick Violates the Sacred Duel!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Brogy gives Dorry booze from Nami and Usopp. The booze explodes when Dorry drinks it. The duel starts once again, and even though his chance to win is very low due to his injury, Dorry still... Read all

episode_japan_title: Brogy Shouri no Goukyuu! Elbaf no Kecchaku
episode_english_title: Broggy’s Bitter Tears of Victory! The Conclusion of Elbaf!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: The salvage of a hundred year duel ends?

episode_japan_title: Ma no Candle! Munen no Namida to Ikari no Namida
episode_english_title: The Devilish Candle! Tears of Regret and Tears of Anger!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Mr. 3 manages to capture Broggy with his wax. He also captures Vivi, Nami and Zoro, and tries to turn them into wax figures.

episode_japan_title: Luffy o Osou Maryoku! Colors Trap
episode_english_title: A Hex on Luffy! Colors Trap!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Luffy tries to save Nami, Vivi and Zoro who are almost turned into wax figures. However, Miss Golden Week, partner of Mr. 3, keeps Luffy busy with her colors trap.

episode_japan_title: Iza Hangeki! Usopp no Kiten to Kaenboshi!
episode_english_title: Time to Fight Back! Usopp's Quick Thinking and Fire Star!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: With Vivi, Nami, and Zoro are almost petrified completely by the wax and Luffy is trapped by Miss Golden Week's power, Usopp is the only one left to save them all.

episode_japan_title: Saraba Kyojin no Shima! Arabasuta o Mezase
episode_english_title: Farewell Giant Island! Head for Alabasta!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: After defeating Baroque Works on the island, Straw Hat Pirate sets sail to Arabasta. Brogy and Dorry set them off and help them escape from the giant goldfish that tries to eat Going Merry.

episode_japan_title: Nami ga Byouki? Umi ni Furu Yuki no Mukou ni!
episode_english_title: Nami’s Sick? Beyond the Snow Falling on the Sea!
synopsis: Luffy's crew gets a trouble when their navigator, Nami, is sick, and they do not have a doctor on the ship.

episode_japan_title: Kishuu! Bliking Gou to Blik no Wapol
episode_english_title: A Raid! The Tin Tyrant and Tin Plate Wapol!
synopsis: Straw Hat crew tries to find a doctor in a nearby island, but they are attacked by the pirate Wapol.

episode_japan_title: Isha no Inai Shima? Na mo Naki Kuni no Bouken!
episode_english_title: An Island Without Doctors? Adventure in a Nameless Land!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Not only that the island has no name, it doesn't have a doctor as well. The only one called doctor lives in the castle on the mountain's top. Sanji and Luffy go taking Nami there, while Vivi... Read all

episode_japan_title: Happy kai? Majo to Yobareta Isha!
episode_english_title: Are You Happy? The Doctor Called Witch!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: It turns out that Dr. Kureha is on the other side of the island, and Usopp, Vivi and Dalton rush to find her. However, Dalton returns to the village after heard that Wapol comes back.

episode_japan_title: Dolton no Kakugo! Wapol Gundan Shima ni Jouriku
episode_english_title: Dalton’s Resolve! Wapol’s Corps Lands on the Island!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Dalton faces Wapol, who wants to take over the island once more, but gets hit by arrows. The avalanche stops, and it injures Sanji. It is up for Luffy now to climb the mountain to save both ... Read all

episode_japan_title: Yuki no Sumu Shima! Drum-Rocky o Nobore!
episode_english_title: The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Avalanche aftermath & the mountain climbing on the Drum Rockies.

episode_japan_title: Tonakai wa Aoppana! Chopper no Himitsu
episode_english_title: Blue-Nosed Reindeer! Chopper’s Secret!
writers: Eiichirô Oda, Junki Takegami, Bonny Clinkenbeard
synopsis: Nami asks Chopper to join Straw Hat's crew, but the reindeer refuses. Knowing Chopper's unique ability, Luffy is also interested to have him as the crew.

episode_japan_title: Higeki! Kamen ni kakusareta Dubaru no shinjitsu
episode_english_title: Tragedy! The Truth of the Unmasked Duval
synopsis: The Straw Hat Pirates do battle with the Flying Fish Riders and Macro Fishman Pirates. The stakes rise when Duval reveals himself, and exactly who his grudge is against: Sanji.

episode_japan_title: Sakuretsu! Sanîgou no chouhimitsu heiki gaonhou
episode_english_title: Explosion! The Sunny's Super Secret Weapon: Gaon Cannon
synopsis: Duval reveals that he was once a small-time bandit until Sanji's wanted poster came to light. Since then he hid his face with the iron mask until he could get revenge on Sanji.

episode_japan_title: Gyojin-tou o Mezashite Jouriku: Sabaody Shotou
episode_english_title: Landing to Get to Fish-Man Island! The Sabaody Archipelago
synopsis: With the Flying Fish Riders taken care of, the Straw Hats rest as Hatchan treats them to the promised takoyaki.

episode_japan_title: Bougyaku! Sabaody no Shihaisha Tenryuubito
episode_english_title: Tyranny! The Rulers of Sabaody, the Celestial Dragons
synopsis: After landing on the Sabaody Archipelago, the Straw Hats begin searching for a man Hatchan knows who can coat their ship, so they can continue onto Fishman Island.

episode_japan_title: Arata na Rival Shuuketsu! 11-nin no Choushinsei
episode_english_title: New Rivals Gather! The 11 Supernovas
synopsis: The Straw Hat Pirates fight and defeat some bounty hunters who want their bounty.

episode_japan_title: Hyouteki wa Camie!! Semaru Hitosaraiya no Mashu
episode_english_title: The Target Is Camie! The Looming Clutches of a Professional Kidnapper
synopsis: Departing from Shakky's Rip-off Bar, Luffy's group attempt to search for Rayleigh but is distracted by the Sabaody Park. Zoro is disrespectful to Saint Charlos, causing him to be shot at.

episode_japan_title: Camie o Sukue: Shotou ni Nokoru Ankoku no Rekishi
episode_english_title: Rescue Camie! The Archipelago’s Lingering Dark History
synopsis: Duval and his crew arrive on the Archipelago and start gathering the Straw Hats up to bring them to the Human Auctioning House, where the kidnappers have brought Camie.

episode_japan_title: Time Limit: Human Auction Kaimaku
episode_english_title: Time Limit! The Human Auction Begins
synopsis: The human auction finally begins, and it is only then that the Straw Hats discovered that their mermaid friend is being sold off at Grove 1.

episode_japan_title: Tekken Sakuretsu! Auction o Buttsubuse
episode_english_title: The Fist Explodes! Destroy the Auction
synopsis: The auction continues, but Saint Charlos arrives and ruins the Straw Hats' plan to buy Camie back by placing an exorbitant bid on her.

episode_japan_title: Dai Panic! Auction Kaijou no Shitou
episode_english_title: Major Panic! Desperate Struggle at the Auction House
synopsis: After Luffy punches Charlos, the guards begin to attack the Straw Hats, and most of the observers, except for Charlos' family, Kid and Law's crews, evacuate.

episode_japan_title: Taishou Kizaru Ugoku! Souzen Sabaody Shotou
episode_english_title: Admiral Kizaru Takes Action! Sabaody Archipelago Thrown Into Chaos
synopsis: Sengoku dispatches Admiral Kizaru to defend the honor of the Celestial Dragons at Sabaody Archipelago.

episode_japan_title: Houimou o Toppa Seyo! Kaigun Tai Sannin no Senchou
episode_english_title: Break Through the Siege! The Navy vs. the Three Captains
synopsis: Luffy, Law and Kid's crews join the fight and defeat the rest of the Marines outside the Auction House. The three captains promise to meet and fight in the New World.

episode_japan_title: Roger to Rayleigh: Kaizoku Ou to Sono Migiude
episode_english_title: Roger and Rayleigh! The King of the Pirates and His Right Hand Man
synopsis: Upon arriving back at Shakky's Bar, Silvers Rayleigh reveals to the Straw Hats that he was the first mate of the legendary Gol D. Roger and also reveals the truth about his crew's dismissal.

episode_japan_title: Kaihi Fukanou!? Taishou Kizaru no Kousoku no Keri
episode_english_title: No Escape!? Admiral Kizaru’s Light Speed Kick!!
synopsis: Admiral Kizaru appears at the Archipelago and demonstrates his mysterious light abilities, before taking on the Supernova, Basil Hawkins, whilst Urouge and X Drake fight a Pacifista.

episode_japan_title: Attouteki! Kaigun no Sentou Heiki Pacifista
episode_english_title: Overwhelming! The Navy’s Fighting Weapons, the Pacifistas
synopsis: The Straw Hat Pirates fight one of the Pacifistas, and while it does not have Kuma's Devil Fruit powers, it is still able to withstand their strongest attacks.

episode_japan_title: Saranaru Kyouteki Arawaru! Masakari Katsuida Sentoumaru
episode_english_title: An Even Stronger Enemy Appears! The Battle Axe-Carrying Sentomaru
synopsis: The Straw Hat Pirates combine their strongest attacks to defeat the Pacifista, but are exhausted after the battle.

episode_japan_title: Taishou Kizuru no Moukou Mugiwara Ichimi Zettaizetsumei!
episode_english_title: Admiral Kizaru's Fierce Assault! The Straw Hats Face Certain Death!
synopsis: Usopp and Brook's attempt to attack Kizaru and save Zoro's life failed.

episode_japan_title: Kesareta Nakama-tachi: Mugiwara Ichimi Saigo no Hi
episode_english_title: Eliminated Friends! The Final Day of the Straw Hat Crew
synopsis: Sentomaru reveals that Kuma has the ability to make people fly through the sky to far away places.

episode_japan_title: Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Luffy Oyabun Futatabi Kenzan
episode_english_title: Feudal Era Side Story! Boss Luffy Appears Again
synopsis: In an alternate universe set in Edo period Japan, the Mikoshi (portable shrine) race is about to take place, the winner of which receives Beli1,000,000, and Boss Luffy and his friends recrui... Read all

episode_japan_title: Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Yabure! Thriller Shoukai no Wana
episode_english_title: Feudal Era Side Story! Defeat Thriller Company's Trap
synopsis: Robin reveals Brook's past to Luffy and his friends, and decide to help him. Brook is captured by Thriller LTD, but Luffy and Zoro arrive to help him escape.

episode_japan_title: Jouriku! Danshi Kinsei no Shima Amazon Lily
episode_english_title: Landing! The All-Female Island, Amazon Lily
synopsis: Having been hit by Kuma, Luffy is teleported to an unknown island.

episode_japan_title: Isoge! Nakama-tachi no Moto e: Nyougashima no Bouken
episode_english_title: Hurry Back to Your Friends! The Maiden Island Adventure
synopsis: It is revealed that Luffy is on Amazon Lily, an island populated entirely by the Kuja tribe of women warriors.

episode_japan_title: Minna Meromero! Kaizoku Jotei Hancock
episode_english_title: Everyone Falls in Love! Pirate Empress Hancock
synopsis: Luffy decides to leave the island, reunite with his crew and defeat the enemies who had overpowered them earlier, and is determined to borrow a ship.

episode_japan_title: Senaka ni Kakusareta Himitsu: Souguu Luffy to Hebihime
episode_english_title: The Secret Hidden on Their Backs! Luffy and the Snake Princess Meet
synopsis: Boa Hancock's ship reaches Amazon Lily and she returns to her palace.

episode_japan_title: Hijou no Sabaki! Ishi ni Sareta Margaret!!
episode_english_title: Heartless Judgment! Margaret Is Turned to Stone!!
synopsis: Luffy looks at Boa Hancock's back and notes that he has seen what was on it before. Hancock tries, but fails to turn him to stone with her powers when he mistakes her Mero Mero no Mi abiliti... Read all

episode_japan_title: Luffy Daikusen! Hebi Shimai no Haki no Chikara!!
episode_english_title: A Difficult Fight for Luffy! The Snake Sisters' Haki Power!!
synopsis: Luffy is challenged to battle Boa Marigold and Boa Sandersonia in the Amazon Lily arena with the spectators calling for Luffy to be executed.

episode_japan_title: Nouryoku Zenkai Battle!! Gomugomu Tai Hebihebi
episode_english_title: All-Out Special Power Battle!! Gum-Gum vs. Snake-Snake
synopsis: Luffy activates Gear Second and is currently taking the lead.

episode_japan_title: Hancock no Kokuhaku: Shimai no Imawashiki Kako
episode_english_title: Hancock's Confession! The Sisters' Abhorrent Past
synopsis: Hancock decides to test Luffy by giving him an ultimatum: either he gets a ship so he can leave the island while the girls remain statues or she changes them back and Luffy finds another way... Read all

episode_japan_title: Ace o Sukue! Arata na Mokutekichi wa Daikangoku
episode_english_title: Saving Ace! The Next Stop: The Great Prison!
synopsis: Following a party, Luffy learns from Nyon that Hancock is a Shichibukai, and that they have been called together as the Marines is launching an all-out offensive on Whitebeard.

episode_japan_title: Koi wa Hurricane! Meromero Hancock
episode_english_title: Love Is a Hurricane! Hancock Madly in Love!
synopsis: When Nyon visits Hancock, she deduces her illness and when she mentions Luffy wishes to see her, this causes Hancock to get up and speak with him.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Tenkou no Kagaku to Karakurijima
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! The Science of Weather and the Mechanical Island!
synopsis: Nami and Franky story, where they landed and what did they do.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Shima to Momoiro no Rakuen!
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! An Island of Giant Birds and a Pink Paradise!
synopsis: Sanji and Chopper story, where they landed and what did they do.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Shima o Tsunagu Hashi to Shokujin Shokubutsu
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! Bridging the Islands and Vicious Vegetations!
synopsis: Robin and Usopp story, where they landed and what did they do.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Negative Princess to Akuma Ou
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! A Negative Princess and the King of Demons!
synopsis: Zoro and Brook story, where they landed and what did they do.

episode_japan_title: Kesshi no Sennyuu! Kaitei Kangoku Impel Down Sennyuu!
episode_english_title: A Deadly Infiltration! The Underwater Prison Impel Down!
synopsis: Vice Admiral Garp talked proudly to Ace at Impel Down about some of Luffy's actions, and mentions that they both have the blood of a world class criminal.

episode_japan_title: Jigoku de Saikai!? Bara Bara no Mi no Jitsuryokusha!
episode_english_title: A Reunion in Hell?! The Man Who Ate the Chop-Chop Fruit!
synopsis: Hancock turns Domino to stone before she can undergo the body-check, allowing Luffy to escape into the prison.

episode_japan_title: Yabure! Guren Jigoku: Buggy no Dohade Daisakusen
episode_english_title: Break Through the Crimson Hell! Buggy's Chaos-Inducing Plan!
synopsis: Buggy and Luffy fight their way through to the entrance of Level 2 by going through Level 1, Crimson Hell, where the lowest ranking criminals are held.

episode_japan_title: Kangoku Saikyou no Otoko! Doku Ningen Magellan Toujou
episode_english_title: The Strongest Man in the Prison! Poison Man Magellan Appears!
synopsis: Hancock and the others finally reach the office of Magellan, a large man who has eaten the Doku Doku no Mi.

episode_japan_title: Eiga Rendou Special: Ugokidasu Kinjishi no Yabou
episode_english_title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! A Gold Lion's Ambition on the Move!
synopsis: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Sanji arrive on an island called Little East Blue, a smaller version of the East Blue, which is where they met each other.

episode_japan_title: Eiga Rendou Special: Nerawareta Little East Blue
episode_english_title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! Little East Blue in Danger!
synopsis: Luffy, Sanji, Zoro, and Usopp arrive on the island and go to their favorite places in the East Blue.

episode_japan_title: Eiga Rendou Special: Amigo Kaizokudan no Moukou
episode_english_title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! The Fierce Onslaught of the Amigo Pirates!
synopsis: Largo uses his devil fruit power to create nets from his body and trap Zoro and Sanji.

episode_japan_title: Eiga Rendou Special: Kessen! Luffy Tai Largo
episode_english_title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! Luffy vs. Largo - The Battle Is On!
synopsis: After escaping from the net, Luffy knocks Largo far away and goes off to fight him.

episode_japan_title: Toraware no Ouka Shichibukai! Kaikyou no Jinbee
episode_english_title: A Warlord in Prison! Jimbei the First Son of the Sea!
synopsis: Luffy and Buggy find Galdino and together they continue to fight through Level 2 of Impel Down, hounded by both Manticores and Puzzle Scorpions.

episode_japan_title: Roubanchou Saldeath no Wana: Level 3 Kiga Jigoku
episode_english_title: Chief Jailer Saldeath's Trap! Level 3 - Starvation Hell!
synopsis: Luffy, Buggy, and Galdino find themselves on Level 3, a barren floor of extreme heat.

episode_japan_title: Tokihanatareta Swan! Saikai! Bon Clay
episode_english_title: The Unleashed Swan! A Reunion With Bon Clay!
synopsis: The prison staff and Hancock finally arrive on the floor where Ace is being held.

episode_japan_title: Shochou Magellan Ugoku: Kansei! Mugiwara Houimou
episode_english_title: Warden Magellan's Strategy! Straw Hat Entrapment Completed!
synopsis: Magellan finally receives word of Luffy's break-in, and decides to gather his forces to Level 4, to cut off Luffy and his allies.

episode_japan_title: Zensenryoku Shuuketsu! Level 4 Shounetsu Jigoku no Kessen
episode_english_title: All Forces Have Gathered! The Battle on Level 4 - The Burning Heat Hell!
synopsis: Luffy and his team fall to the hot fire while Magellan works out the plan to capture them.

episode_japan_title: Magellan Tsuyoshi! Bon Clay Tekizen Toubou
episode_english_title: Mighty Magellan! Bon Clay Bugs Out!
synopsis: Luffy begins fighting Magellan despite Bentham's warnings to flee, and finds that he is unable to go on the offensive because of Magellan's poisonous body and long-range poison attacks.

episode_japan_title: Shiyuu Kessu! Sutemi no Luffy Saigo no Ichigeki
episode_english_title: The Showdown Has Come! Luffy's Desperate Last Attack!
synopsis: Magellan has Luffy backed into a corner and is using his devil fruit powers to poison Luffy.

episode_japan_title: Dachi Dakara: Bon Clay Kesshi no Kyuushutsukou
episode_english_title: For His Friend! Bon Clay Goes to the Deadly Rescue!
synopsis: Luffy is thrown into a cell where he is left to die of poisoning.

episode_japan_title: Jigoku ni Rakuen! Impel Down Level 5.5
episode_english_title: A Paradise in Hell! Impel Down - Level 5.5!
synopsis: Mr. 2 apologizes for abandoning Luffy and searches for Ivankov.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Chiryou Kaishi: Ivan-san Kiseki no Chikara!!
episode_english_title: Luffy's Treatment Begins! Iva's Miraculous Power!
synopsis: Emporio Ivankov displays some of his powers, including stopping a vengeful pirate's cannon shot merely by winking.

episode_japan_title: Kiseki o Shinjite! Bon Clay Tamashii no Seien
episode_english_title: Believe in Miracles! Bon Clay's Cries From the Heart!
synopsis: Bentham learns that Ivankov has the ability to control hormones.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Fukkatsu! Iwa-san Datsugoku Keikaku Shidou!!
episode_english_title: Luffy Back in Action! Iva Begins the Breakout Plan!!
synopsis: As Luffy is finally revived, he is informed by Emporio Ivankov about Iva's background.

episode_japan_title: Ace Gosou Kaishi: Saikasou Level 6 no Koubou!
episode_english_title: Ace's Convoy Begins! Battle on the Lowest Floor - Level 6!
synopsis: When Luffy made it to Level 6 with Ivankov and Inazuma, they met up with the former cellmate of Ace, Jinbe.

episode_japan_title: Saikyou Team Kessei: Shinkan! Inpel Down
episode_english_title: The Ultimate Team Has Formed! Shaking Impel Down!
synopsis: Luffy is reluctant to free Crocodile, but Ivankov offers to keep him in line by blackmailing him with a weakness he knows about.

episode_japan_title: Saranaru Konran! Kurohige Teach Shuurai!
episode_english_title: Even More Chaos! Here Comes Blackbeard Teach!
synopsis: While Luffy and his allies continue fighting on Level 4 of Impel Down, Buggy and Mr. 3 reach Level 2 and release the prisoners there to cause a riot to cover their escape.

episode_japan_title: Kiken na Deai! Kurohige to Ame no Shiryuu
episode_english_title: The Dangerous Encounter! Blackbeard and Shiryu of the Rain!
synopsis: The Jailer Beasts arrive and overpower many of the prisoners, but Luffy, Jinbe and Crocodile defeat them in a single attack each.

episode_japan_title: Iji demo Taorenu! Honki no Hannyabaru
episode_english_title: Refusal to Be Defeated! Serious Hannyabal
synopsis: Luffy fights Hannyabal who tries to stop the escapees, but then Blackbeard shows up and breaks up the fight between Luffy and Hannyabal.

episode_japan_title: Ikari no Jet Pistol: Luffy vs Kurohige
episode_english_title: Jet Pistol of Anger! Luffy vs. Blackbeard!
synopsis: Although Luffy wants a proper battle with Blackbeard, Jinbe reminds him there's no time for that as Ace's execution will occur in only a few short hours.

episode_japan_title: Magellan o Tomero! Iva-san Ougi Sakuretsu
episode_english_title: Stop Magellan! Iva's Esoteric Technique Explodes!
synopsis: Luffy and the other prisoners are getting closer to the surface, having made it through levels 3 and 2.

episode_japan_title: Magellan no Kisaku! Habamareta Datsugoku Keikaku
episode_english_title: Magellan's Tricky Move! A Foiled Escaped Plan!
synopsis: Luffy becomes enraged after learning about Magellan defeating Emporio Ivankov and Inazuma, but Mr. 2 and Jinbe persuade him that escaping takes priority.

episode_japan_title: Datsugoku Team Zettaizetsumei: Kinjite "Venom Demon"
episode_english_title: The Escapee Team in Trouble! The Forbidden Move: Venom Demon!
synopsis: Jinbe, Crocodile and Daz Bones finally secure a Marine vessel to escape with. Meanwhile, Luffy continues his fight against Magellan, with the assistance of Galdino's Doru Doru no Mi powers.

episode_japan_title: Okose Saigo no Kiseki: Seigi no Mon o Toppa Seyo
episode_english_title: Come, Final Miracle! Break Through the Gate of Justice!
synopsis: Bentham puts himself on the line to save Luffy and the others, by disguising himself as Warden Magellan.

episode_japan_title: Mezase Kaigun Honbu: Ace Kyuushutsu e no Funade!
episode_english_title: To the Navy Headquarters! Off to Rescue Ace!
synopsis: Shiliew saves Blackbeard and his crew by giving them antidotes to Magellan's poison before taking the opportunity to join with them.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Weatheria Report to Cyborg Animal
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! The Weatheria Report and the Cyborg Animals!
synopsis: As Luffy's ship heads to the Marine Headquarters, the scene shifts to a point some time in the past.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Hina to Momoiro no Taiketsu
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! A Cheeper of Giant Birds and a Pink Showdown!
synopsis: Sanji is chased by okamas to Caroline - the queen's stand in.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kakumeigun to Boushoku no Mori no Wana!
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! Revolutionaries and the Gorging Forest's Trap!
synopsis: Robin was captured by the guards of Tequila Wolf and was sent to the Prison Tower.

episode_japan_title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyodai na Bohyou to Pantsu no On
episode_english_title: The Friends' Whereabouts! A Huge Tomb and the Panty Debt!
synopsis: While heading to the sea to return to the Sabaody Archipelago, Zoro and Perona stumble upon an enormous tombstone. Brook decides he has to wait to find Luffy and the others until he can fulf... Read all

episode_japan_title: Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Kyoudai no Chikai!
episode_english_title: A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Vow of the Brotherhood!
directors:
Eiichirô Oda, Hirohiko Uesaka
Sean Whitley(english version)
synopsis: Luffy recalls his childhood with Ace and meeting Marshall D. Teach in Jaya without knowing who he was.

episode_japan_title: Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Shuuketsu! San Taishou
episode_english_title: A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Three Navy Admirals Come Together!
directors:
Eiichirô Oda, Hirohiko Uesaka
Sean Whitley(english version)
synopsis: While Luffy's on his way to rescue Ace, everyone at Marine Headquarters gets ready for the execution.

episode_japan_title: Kessen no Toki Semaru! Kaigun Saikyou no Fujin Kansei!
episode_english_title: Ticking Down to the Time of Battle! The Navy's Strongest Lineup in Position!
synopsis: Only three hours remain until Ace's execution. Luffy reaches Marineford but finds the Gates of Justice closed.

episode_japan_title: Kyodai Kantai Arawaru: Shuurai! Shirohige Kaizokudan
episode_english_title: A Vast Fleet Appears! Here Come the Whitebeard Pirates!
synopsis: The world is shocked by the revelation of Ace's father's identity.

episode_japan_title: Kessen no Makuake! Ace to Shirohige no Kako
episode_english_title: The Beginning of the War! Ace and Whitebeard's Past!
synopsis: Whitebeard reveals his Devil Fruit powers in front of the Marines.

episode_japan_title: Sekai o Horobosu Chikara! Guragura no Mi no Nouryoku
episode_english_title: The Force That Could Destroy the World! The Power of the Tremor-Tremor Fruit!
synopsis: The sea-quakes made by Whitebeard cause a tsunami to come upon Marineford.

episode_japan_title: Subete o Yakitsukusu!! Taishou Akainu no Chikara!
episode_english_title: An All-Consuming Inferno!! Admiral Akainu's Power!
synopsis: All the various Whitebeard Commanders show off their skills and abilities, as do some Marines.

episode_japan_title: Majin no Shison! Little Oars Jr. Bakushin!
episode_english_title: A Descendant of the Beast! Little Oars Jr. - Full Speed Ahead!
synopsis: Oars Jr. goes straight for Ace, but the Giant Squad attempts to stop him without much success.

episode_japan_title: Shousha dake ga Seigi Hatsudou! Sengoku no Sakusen!
episode_english_title: Justice for the Winners! Sengoku's Strategy in Action!
synopsis: Koby and Helmeppo attempted to flee from the war after feeling too overwhelmed by the deaths and chaos, but stumbled upon Akainu and an apparent plan by Sengoku.

episode_japan_title: Mugiwara Team Touchaku Fuunkyuu o Tsugeru Senjou
episode_english_title: Straw Hat Team Arrives! Tension Grows at the Battlefield
synopsis: Luffy finally shows up together with his formed alliance from the escaped prisoners of Impel Down.

episode_japan_title: Shinde mo Tasukeru: Luffy vs Kaigun Battle Start
episode_english_title: Even If It Means Death! Luffy vs. the Navy, the Battle Starts!
synopsis: With Luffy as their inspiration, the other pirates fight back with renewed vigor.

episode_japan_title: Gekisen no Renzoku! Nouryokusha Gundan VS Nouryokusha Gundan
episode_english_title: Hard Battles, One After Another! Devil Fruit Users vs. Devil Fruit Users!
synopsis: One battle after another, it is complete chaos out on the battlefield.

episode_japan_title: Kuma ni Okita Ihen Iva-san Ikari no Ichigeki
episode_english_title: Kuma's Transformation! Iva's Blow of Anger!
synopsis: Luffy receives the key to Ace's handcuffs from Hancock, who then fantasizes about a wedding ceremony held on Amazon Lily.

episode_japan_title: Kengou Mihawk Luffy ni Semaru Kokutou no Zangeki
episode_english_title: The Great Swordsman Mihawk! Luffy Comes Under the Attack of the Black Sword!
synopsis: Luffy stumbles upon Mihawk, whom he tries to avoid.

episode_japan_title: Senmetsu Sakusen Shidou: Pacifista Gundan no Iryoku
episode_english_title: The Extermination Strategy in Action! The Power of the Pacifistas!
synopsis: The Pacifista enter Marineford as part of Sengoku's plan to win the war against Whitebeard.

episode_japan_title: Akainu no Bouryaku! Otoshiirerareta Shirohige
episode_english_title: Akainu's Plot! Whitebeard Entrapped!
synopsis: As Squard stabs Whitebeard, the pirates and even marines in the war are shocked due to his betrayal.

episode_japan_title: Houiheki Sadou! Shirohige Kaizokudan Zettaizetsumei!!
episode_english_title: The Encircling Walls Activated! The Whitebeard Pirates Backed Into a Corner!
synopsis: In a desperate attempt to stop Whitebeard from advancing to the execution platform, the Marines activate walls to block Whitebeard's path, but gets stopped by the ice.

episode_japan_title: Shokei Shikkou Shirei Kudaru: Houiheki o Toppa Seyo!
episode_english_title: Execution Order Issued! Break Through the Encircling Walls!
synopsis: Akainu's Meteor Volcano melts the nearly all the ice and destroys the Whitebeard Pirates' ships, dropping them into boiling water, enabling the cannons on the wall to bombard them while the ... Read all

episode_japan_title: Saishuu Kyokumen Totsunyuu! Shirohige Kishikaisei no Itte
episode_english_title: Moving Into the Final Phase! Whitebeard's Trump Card for Recovery!
synopsis: Luffy attempts to slip past the admirals, but Kizaru easily catches up to him and knocks him to the ground.

episode_japan_title: Luffy Chikaratsuku! Oris Hiroba no Souryokusen!!
episode_english_title: Luffy at the End of His Tether! An All-Out Battle at the Oris Plaza!
synopsis: Ace thinks back to his childhood, when he fought with anyone who spoke ill of Roger, and wondering if he should ever have been born.

episode_japan_title: Inochi o Kezuru Chikara: Tension Hormone Futatabi
episode_english_title: The Power That Will Shorten One's Life! Energy Hormone, Redux!
synopsis: Whitebeard falters for a moment as a result of his age and physical condition.

episode_japan_title: Yakusoku no Tame ni!! Gekitou! Luffy to Coby
episode_english_title: To Live up to a Promise! Luffy and Coby Collide!
synopsis: Luffy with his newly restored strength continues on to the execution platform to save Ace and is warned by Ivankov that the hormones only trick his body.

episode_japan_title: Shokeidai Mokuzen! Hirakareta Ace e no Michi!!
episode_english_title: The Scaffold at Last! The Way to Ace Has Opened!
synopsis: Luffy uses Haki unintentionally just as Ace is about to be executed.

episode_japan_title: Sorezore no Eranda Michi: Luffy vs Garp!
episode_english_title: Each on Different Paths! Luffy vs. Garp!
